**ğŸ†” ID CARD**

**ğŸ“„ Obtaining Official Documents/References**

Student can apply online or offline from their MY.SDU.PORTAL portal under the Online Services tab.

1. Online reference with QR code and digital signature. If you applied for an online reference, you can download it from MY SDU PORTAL within 3 working days.
2. Offline reference can be obtained by selecting STUDENT AFFAIRS with signature and seal from Advising Desk.

Types of references:
1. Allowance: (Ğ¦ĞĞ) â„–4, â„–6.
2. Military registration: â„–3.
3. School, work: University reference.
4. Transcript.
ğŸ” Access to oldmy.sdu portal

**ğŸ¥ Medical Certificate**

To submit a medical certificate, you need to fill out the Google form in QR form.

**IMPORTANT:** The application together with the certificate must be submitted within 5 working days from the date of issuance of the medical certificate.
ğŸ“‹ Google form for Medical Certificate

**ğŸ“„ Archival Reference/Academic Transcript**

Dear graduate, to get an archival reference/academic reference, write to ssc@sdu.edu.kz your year of study/graduation, ID document and the language in which you need the document. It will be ready within 3 working days after receiving the application.
ğŸ“‹ Google form for Archival Reference

**ğŸ“ Restore Diploma**

Dear graduate, to restore your diploma, go to EGOV.KZ.

Submit your application by clicking the "ONLINE SERVICES IN ONE LIST-EDUCATION-ISSUANCE OF DUPLICATES OF EDUCATION DOCUMENTS" button.

After the application is accepted, the diploma will be ready within 15 working days.
ğŸ” Access to EGOV.KZ
